thread.title: Legs!

comments.text: Hi everybody! There's 2 new body spheres to attach to today... for legs (or anything else you can think of, really)! Feedback welcome & hope you enjoy!
These spheres only show when you open the Me mirror. They are roughly at the upper knee position of the lower part of the leg.
To move a leg on Vive: Hold the Thumbpad pressed at the bottom position, then move/ rotate your hand. (Your in-world hand will then keep still.)
To move a leg on Oculus: Move the Thumbstick down and hold, then move/ rotate your hand.
To reset your legs to their original position, use Me -> ... -> More -> Reset Legs. (They'll also reset upon relaunching Anyland for now, we might change that...)
You can use "When triggered then ..." on legs, it happens when you press the trigger while in leg-moving mode for that hand (you'll also get a "leg triggered left/right" body tell)
Update 164: We fixed how legs are rotated if you already rotated the sphere for a bit... it should now be much more intuitive in those cases! Thx Zid, Sloppy & all!
